backalleyrogue.name: Back-Alley Rogue
backalleyrogue.text: Summon: Steal Cover from another crature.

daringheist.name: Daring Heist
daringheist.text: Draw two cards. Daring Heist can't be played unless a creature in each lane damaged your opponent this turn.

cogcollector.name: Cog Collector
cogcollector.text: Pilfer: Add a gear to Cog Collector. Last Gasp: Summon a random (neutral) creature with cost equal to the number of gears on Cog Collector.

nixhoundfabricant.name: Nix-Hound Fabricant
nixhoundfabricant.text: Summon: If you hava a (Neutral) card in play, Shackle an enemy creature.

murkwaterguide.name: Murkwater Guide
murkwaterguide.text: Treasure Hunt - 0-cost card: Put a copy of the 'treasure' into your hand.

ruthlessfreebooter.name: Ruthless Freebooter
ruthlessfreebooter.text: Treasure Hunt - Drain: +1/+1 and Drain. Treasure Hunt - Lethal: +1/+1 and Lethal.

sailsthroughstorms.name: Sails-Through-Storms
sailsthroughstorms.text: Pilfer: Summon the top creature of your deck.

brassilisk.name: Brassilisk
brassilisk.text: When Brassilisk takes damage and survives, summon a copy of it in the other lane.

galyntheshelterer.name: Galyn The Shelterer
galyntheshelterer.text: Summon: Choose a creature or item in your hand. Shuffle three copies of it with +3/+3 into your deck.

halloweddeathpriest.name: Hallowed Deathpriest
halloweddeathpriest.text: Summon: Transform the highest cost creature in your opponent's hand into a Shriveled Mummy.

hulkingfabricant.name: Hulking Fabricant
hulkingfabricant.text: Summon: If you hava a (Neutral) card in play, +3/+3

mistveilwarden.name: Mistveil Warden
mistveilwarden.text: Treasure Hunt - Guard: Give the Guard +1/+2

arcaneumlibrarian.name: Arcaneum Librarian
arcaneumlibrarian.text: Gains +1/+0 when you draw a card during your turn.

excavate.name: Excavate
excavate.text: Draw an item or support from your discard pile.

reverbaratingstrike.name: Reverbarating Strike
reverbaratingstrike.text: Deal 3 damage to a creature and all enemy creatures with the same name.

laaneth.name: Laaneth
laaneth.text: Summon: Draw a card of your choice from your deck.

memorywraith.name: Memory Wraith
memorywraith.text: Summon: Banish your opponent's discard pile.

shalkfabricant.name: Shalk Fabricant
shalkfabricant.text: Guard. Summon: If you have a (Neutral) card in play, put a random action into your hand.

assembledtitan.name: Assembled Titan
assembledtitan.text: Assemble: Choose two: +2/+0, +0/+2, deal 2 damage to your opponent, or gain 2 health.

abandonedimperfect.name: Abandoned Imperfect
abandonedimperfect.text: Treasure Hunt - Three (Neutral) cards: Sacrifice Abandoned Imperfect to summon an 8/8 Awakened Imperfect with Breakthrough and Guard to the lane of your choice.

assembledconduit.name: Assembled Conduit
assembledconduit.text: Assemble: +1/+0 and Breakthrough or +0/+1 and Regenerate.

brassarquebus.name: Brass Arquebus
brassarquebus.text: Last Gasp: Draw three different randon 1-cost creatures from your deck.

clockworkdragon.name: Clockwork Dragon
clockworkdragon.text: Summon: If Clockwork Dragon is in the left lane, +2/+0 and Drain. Otherwise, +0/+2 and Guard.

dormantcenturion.name: Dormant Centurion
dormantcenturion.text: Dormant Centurion can't attack unless you've played an action this turn.

dragonaspect.name: Dragon Aspect
dragonaspect.text: You gain 3 health and Battle an enemy creature as if you had 3 power.

dwarvencolossus.name: Dwarven Colossus
dwarvencolossus.text: Summon: Summon a Power Sphere in each lane.

fabricate.name: Fabricate
fabricate.text: Build a custom creature and put it into your hand.

gearworkspider.name: Gearwork Spider
gearworkspider.text: Prophecy, Guard. Summon: Summon all Gearwork Spiders in your discard pile.

starsungbard.name: Star-Sung Bard
starsungbard.text: Immune to Silence. Your unique cards cost 1 less.

mecinar.name: Mecinar
mecinar.text: Summon: Stitch together the top creature from both decks to create an Abomination and put it into your hand

reflectiveautomaton.name: Reflective Automaton
reflectiveautomaton.text: Reflective Automaton has all creature types.

skeevaton.name: Skeevaton
skeevaton.text: Summon: +1/+1 for each other Skeever you've summoned this game.

treasuremap.name: Treasure Map
treasuremap.text: +1/+1. Summon: Draw a card. If the wielder has Teasure Hunt, draw something they are hunting for instead

aldorathedaring.name: Aldora the Daring
aldorathedaring.text: Teasure Hunt - Action, Creture, Item, Support: +6/+6. When a friendly creature hunter finds something summon Skywag or give Skywag +1/+1

firepotspider.name: Firepot Spider
firepotspider.text: Last Gasp: Deal 1 damage to all creatures in this lane.

grapplinghook.name: Grappling Hook
grapplinghook.text: +3/+2. Summon: Move an enemy creature into this lane. It loses Cover.

hunterkillers.name: Hunter-Killers
hunterkillers.text: Summon: Battle an enemy creature, then Battle another enemy creature.

ratwayprospector.name: Ratway Prospector
ratwayprospector.text: Treasure Hunt - Support, item, action: +5/+5. After Ratway Prospector attacks, it gains Cover.

relichunter.name: Relic Hunter
relichunter.text: Treasure Hunt - Item: Give the item +1/+1.

trialofflame.name: Trial of Flame
trialofflame.text: Choose a lane. Destroy all creatures except for the most powerful creature on noth sides of that lane.

verminousfabricant.name: Verminous Fabricant
verminousfabricant.text: Summon: If you have a (Neutral) card in play, Silence another creature.

clockworkapostle.name: Clockwork Apostle
clockworkapostle.text: Summon: Give another friendly creature +4/+4, it becomes (Neutral).

kagoutifabricant.name: Kagouti Fabricant
kagoutifabricant.text: Summon: If you hava a (Neutral) card in play, summon a copy of Kagouti Fabricant in the other lane.

mecinarswill.name: Mecinar's Will
mecinarswill.text: Steal an enemy creature with 3 power or less until the end of the turn. It gains Charge.

ruinarchaeologist.name: Ruin Archaeologist
ruinarchaeologist.text: Treasure Hunt - Support: Draw a card.

phalanxexemplar.name: Phalanx Exemplar
phalanxexemplar.text: Guard. When your opponent draws a Prophecy from a rune being destroyed, put a 1/2 Septim Guardsman with Guard into your hand.

reconstructionengine.name: Reconstruction Engine
reconstructionengine.text: Uses: 5. Activate: Give a friendly creature -1/-1 and summon a 1/1 Reconstruction Spider.

themechanicalheart.name: The Mechanical Heart
themechanicalheart.text: Ongoing. When you have 0 or less health, sacrifice The Mechanical Heart, set your health to 10, and restore a rune.
